column4: I need some serious CDROM/CDRW mounting help from someone who really knows their stuff.... PLEASE!!!
Anyone?
cd's should mount automatically.. mine do
heh, I wish mine did.
the settings to auto-mount a cd are in System -> Preferrences -> Preferred Applications
the first tab
sorry, it's in Removeable Drives and Media

All the mount checkboxes are checked... which means there's aproblem somewhere and the drives don't mount automatically ... hence the reason why they won't mount manually either. I need to figure out what's wrong and fix it first :(
ahh, nice job of tracking that down on your part :)
I haven't done too much on my own actually... ToHellWithGA has been helping me.
do you have any experience troubleshooting cdrom/rw mounting?
no, sorry, they've always just wokred for me.
okay, well thanks anyway :)
does the cd drive appear in the hardware browser?
yep... just doesn't mount
tried mounting as root?
yeah, all it does is comes back to the prompt... no errors nothing!
where's a log file I can check?
/var/log/messages
thanks, checking now
/ ToHellWithGA: "Jul  3 22:31:46 desktop kernel: [55884.692313]  cdrom: This disc doesn't have any tracks I recognize!"
blank disc?
last I tried it was a commercial CD (Norton Anti-Virus in my CDRW and ATI Radeon Drivers in my CDR)
wow
